I can render complex 4K projects in half the time it took on my previous Intel Mac. The Space Black finish is sleek and surprisingly resistant to fingerprints.', 'Best laptop screen I have ever seen. The 120Hz ProMotion makes everything feel butter-smooth, and the battery life actually lasts a full workday even with heavy Lightroom use.', 'It is a massive investment, but for professional video work, it pays for itself in saved time. The speakers are also surprisingly deep and clear for a laptop.']}}

I checked your past orders, available discounts, and the MacBook listing. Short version: the discount currently in your account (SPRING10 = 90% off) is better than any discount used on past orders, so there's no need to refund an old order to get a better discount.

Details and numbers
- MacBook found: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch, M3 Pro — product_id P034 — price $1,999.99.
- Available discount in your account: SPRING10 — 90% off.
- Past discounts used on your orders:
  - ORDER-107495: BLACKFRIDAY50 — 50% off (TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse, saved 50%).
  - ORDER-112543: GOODBUY20 — 20% off (Portable SSD 1TB).
  - Other orders had no discount.
- Price comparisons for the MacBook (list price $1,999.99):
  - With SPRING10 (90%): $1,999.99 * 10% = $199.999 → $200.00 (approx).
  - With BLACKFRIDAY50 (50%): $1,999.99 * 50% = $999.995 → $1,000.00 (approx).
  - With GOODBUY20 (20%): $1,999.99 * 80% = $1,599.992 → $1,599.99 (approx).

Recommendation
- Use SPRING10 (90%) — it yields the lowest final price (~$200). No refund of a previous order is needed.

Next steps — I can proceed if you confirm
- Add the MacBook (product_id P034) to your cart and checkout using SPRING10 (quantity 1 unless you want more).
- Or, if you still want me to refund a specific past order (for any reason), tell me which order ID and I can process the refund (note: refunded discounts return to your discount list — but BLACKFRIDAY50 would still be worse than SPRING10).
